input-field.name: ProcessOriginalImageMaxWidth
input-field.label: Maximum width of full size image
input-field.helpText: Additionally to the config for thumbnail-sizes, the image uploaded to media is always used as highest thumbnail size. Therefore, it should also be processed. You can set a maximum width for this image. Default: 3000

input-field.name: ExtensionsAllowList
input-field.label: Allow list for file extensions
input-field.helpText: You can set a list of file extension seperated by comma which will be processed. F.e. some services will convert SVG files into jpg or webp which results in much bigger files. That is why we do not set svg as default here. Default: png, jpg, jpeg, webp, gif
